title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Animal Health and Welfare and Forestry
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Animal Health and Welfare and Forestry
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Animal Health and Welfare and Forestry 

(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 (Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited animal health welfare forestry (miscellaneous provisions) act 2022 (commencement) order 2022

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Animal Health and Welfare and Forestry
heading: 2. The 9th day of December 2022 is appointed as the day on which Parts 1
text_raw:
2. The 9th day of December 2022 is appointed as the day on which Parts 1 
and 2 of the Animal Health and Welfare and Forestry (Miscellaneous 
Provisions) Act 2022 (No. 4 of 2022) come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

08 December, 2022. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 10th January, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [640] 3
